overview: Father Greg Pilkington is torn between his call as a conservative Catholic priest and his secret life as a homosexual with a gay lover, frowned upon by the Church. Upon hearing the confession of a young girl of her incestuous father, Greg enters an intensely emotional spiritual struggle deciding between choosing morals over religion and one life over another.
tagline: In a world of rituals, in a place of secrets, a man must choose between keeping the faith and exposing the truth.
cast: Linus Roache|Tom Wilkinson|Robert Carlyle|Cathy Tyson|Lesley Sharp
